              a
               
              noise
              ,

speaker: GONZALO
text:
That’s
               
              verily
              .
               
              ’Tis
               
              best
               
              we
               
              stand
               
              upon
               
              our
               
              guard
              ,

speaker: GONZALO
text:
Or
               
              that
               
              we
               
              quit
               
              this
               
              place
              .
               
              Let’s
               
              draw
               
              our
               
              weapons
              .

speaker: ALONSO
text:
Lead
               
              off
               
              this
               
              ground
              ,
               
              and
               
              let’s
               
              make
               
              further
               
              search

speaker: ALONSO
text:
For
               
              my
               
              poor
               
              son
              .

speaker: GONZALO
text:
Heavens
               
              keep
               
              him
               
              from
               
              these
               
              beasts
              ,

speaker: GONZALO
text:
For
               
              he
               
              is
              ,
               
              sure
              ,
               
              i’
               
              th’
               
              island
              .

speaker: ALONSO
text:
Lead
               
              away
              .

speaker: ARIEL
text:
Prospero
               
              my
               
              lord
               
              shall
               
              know
               
              what
               
              I
               
              have
               
              done
              .

speaker: ARIEL
text:
So
              ,
               
              king
              ,
               
              go
               
              safely
               
              on
               
              to
               
              seek
               
              thy
               
              son
              .
